data.title: Pehlu Khan (55) and others
data.victim_action: were legally transporting two milch cows to Haryana in a pickup truck.
data.victim_names: Pehlu Khan (55), Azmat (22), Irshad, Aarif and Rafiq
data.accused_action: saw the victims's pick-up truck on the highway and assumed that they were transporting the bovines illegally.
data.the_lynching: The Gau Rakshaks intercepted the pick-up and proceeded to beat up the men. Pehlu Khan succumbs to injuries.
